overview:
Chris Shimojima joined Nike, Inc. as the Vice President, Global Digital Commerce in November, 2006. In this position, Shimojima oversees the direct-to-consumer digital businesses for the Nike Brand, Cole-Haan, Converse, and Hurley. He reports to Mark Parker, CEO and President of Nike, Inc.

Just prior to Nike, Shimojima was Vice President and General Manager, Sears/Kmart Customer Direct at Sears Holdings Corporation. Before that Shimojima was SVP and CMO at Prudential E-Business Group and the same at Kozmo.com. Earlier in his career he held senior brand management positions at AT&T, Pepsi-Cola and Nestle Foods.

Shimojima received his MBA in Finance/Marketing at the University of Chicago.
